original: Elmgård, Carl Ossian, teol. o. fil. kand., amiralitetspastor, Karlskrona, f. 11/6/9-2 i Elmeboda, Kronob. 1., av hemm:äg. Sven Joh. Joelson o. Gus-tafva Helena Svensson. G. 37 m. Svea Eleonora Sjöstrand. — Stud:ex. i Lund 19, fil. kand. 23, teol. kand. 30, prästex. o. prästv. 30. Vik. amiral :-pred. i Karlskrona 30, e. dito 32, amiral :pastor 41, pred. v. kronohäktet sed. 32, marinp’astor sed. 39. Ordf. i kyrkoråd, kyrkostämma, barnav :nd samt i stift. Militärhemm. sed. 42, v. ordf. i kyrkogårdsstyr. o. i styr. f. sjöm:hemm. Utg. av period, tidslkr. Militärhemmet. LVO.
translated: Elmgård, Carl Ossian, Bachelor of Theology and Philosophy, Navy Chaplain, Karlskrona, born on June 11, 1892 in Elmeboda, Kronoberg County, son of the home owner Sven Joh. Joelson and Gustafva Helena Svensson. Married in 1937 to Svea Eleonora Sjöstrand. He graduated from Lund with a high school degree in 1919, a Bachelor of Philosophy in 1923, a Bachelor of Theology in 1930, and passed his theological examination and was ordained as a priest in 1930. He worked as a temporary naval chaplain in Karlskrona in 1930 and a permanent naval chaplain in 1932, and as a chaplain at the prison since 1932 and at the Marine Church since 1939. He was the chairman of the church council, the church assembly, the children's welfare, and the military home from 1942, and the vice chairman of the cemetery board and the board of directors for the sailors' home. He published a periodical called "Militärhemmet". He was awarded the LVO (Order of Vasa).
